display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Rxp4kz0lRHYQ7kNvwH5yVVG&_nc_oc=Adm2DCHn85G0SpiImwRL58G64NdDSCNVnqwjefu44j2bDDvLVgSAhWpg-4NyEdVJZglYI9AhInhabcWrWPsrdaMq&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=-DeL-Ml1gNPeMH-_ScPLNA&oh=00_AfEqSPiWR35F89J0syZnioIloq5TiuYsTPHFwGlRhPdpbw&oe=68033A1D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ESVhxpf0hfoQ7kNvwF9Bz4u&_nc_oc=Adk3wnnobUm98cB5t9nHi1o0YPbxxrVIjLQlyOrazIyl4hOW3d9pgWin8en2aZm6EWuGx8UKeapOyljm7lh0XywA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=-DeL-Ml1gNPeMH-_ScPLNA&oh=00_AfHEEA2zVNYwrJBhhosLyvE3JettXMRrBxmZI_r-QNyPYg&oe=68031BD2)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cbUDRPlv1QwQ7kNvwEFFNMZ&_nc_oc=AdkKIdwe1wqH9uCs3AyPnA4Cqda7Ce0bkywqwva6ShoWkYTK23YH62LcUiu_Wf99hKOr02cYF2D75hQMTb1YQOty&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=-DeL-Ml1gNPeMH-_ScPLNA&oh=00_AfFOYm-fU5cx99Ub7vcHpyQWiXjQJyBUL57-KqNE3-Heiw&oe=680321E3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=4o-RmfmBQWAQ7kNvwFayS0x&_nc_oc=Adkf6eOxFqJqyVD3N2xyDk7zH1QKfcCyYbbT8ZYNU0tx8NtqnJP08UXGF6F7H4yTckRNilzyBNGVyi5HacdGfc1V&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=-DeL-Ml1gNPeMH-_ScPLNA&oh=00_AfEAZsPYu4m0X8_ZlZNvg-wzEDXKJQ_L-B4UjJnlUH7tYA&oe=6803186E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=dZw7iPtyzx8Q7kNvwELoLnp&_nc_oc=AdlxFs98arg5qsm_t6w_BpBbcQ3J7NfGcSkV8BeFjUr9zvVN0kEPTBOtuGi5eH2VQ4xD3qeDxS-FLK4dvt12ly8i&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=-DeL-Ml1gNPeMH-_ScPLNA&oh=00_AfEQArjCzgQAVBnywH8ysnysNsJllCKO3Smy1-q0rIuMXA&oe=68032056)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
